alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 11:02AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following county, Inyo. This includes Highway 395 in the Owens Valley from Bishop to Independence. * WHEN...Until 200 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1058 AM PST, emergency management reported flooding in the advisory area including along Highway 395 from Gerkin Road to Old Sunland. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Big Pine, Independence, Tinemaha Campground, Taboose Creek Campground, Goodale Creek Campground, Baker Creek Campground, Sawmill Creek Campground, Glacier View Campground, Independence Creek Campground, Wilkerson and West Bishop. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
